reference_response: Healing potions are in limited stock today, but I can sell you one now. If you need more, check back after the caravan arrives.
The royal archive is restricted. Present a stamped writ from the watch captain and I will process your entry request.
The northern watchtower fell after sabotage during a storm. Surviving logs point to an internal betrayal.
Use an iron mace or short sword against goblins. Their rush tactics are dangerous, so keep your distance and do not overextend.
A discount is possible, but not at a loss. I can lower the price slightly if you commit to a fair trade.
I can offer a courier mission with high pay and minimal combat. Escort the supply ledger to the harbor before dusk.
We will verify your statement, check witness reports, and compare physical evidence from the theft scene. Cooperate and the process will move quickly.
Records name Duke Varen as the betrayer of King Alaric, driven by a succession dispute. The motive was control of the regency.
